input.sentences: we were prepped about what to do at the local shelter before we actually started .
my groups job was to peel carrots .
another group was set on peeling potatoes .
the last group was tasked with moving supplies .
at the end of the day | we all felt a rewarding feeling by knowing that we helped those less fortunate than us .
output.sentences: When Michael first started working at the shelter he prepped food.
The first few days, his job was to peel the carrots.
He got done quickly most of the time, so he also helped set tables, and help with any potatoes that needed peeling.
After those weeks he was tasked with getting the supplies separated, and moving them to their needed locations.
It didn't take long at all before Michael came to the knowing that this job was extremely rewarding, and he felt good for how much it truly helped others.
